locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: A six-episode series (10-minute episodes) following one day in the life of our lead WOMAN. The episodes occur chronologically, beginning with the finalization of her recent divorce and ending with a highly-anticipated date. In each episode, WOMAN is in conversation with a male companion. We witness how each of her quotidian, micro decisions can add up to larger life choices. In each episode, WOMAN is played by a different actor, settings and writers change for each episode, but the story-line remains continuous.
imdb.title: Tuesday Nights
